thread.title: Daily Afternoon Randomness in HQ (45 Photos)
thread.title_full: Daily Afternoon Randomness in HQ (45 Photos)

author: John
title: Daily Afternoon Randomness in HQ (45 Photos)
text:
5 
#Johndidtherightthing #pizzawatch 
Last night, Chive On Az, led by Randy, Ralphie, Jason, and Tony, helped us host an Official Chive Meetup that saw over a thousand Chivers absolutely peel the roof off Bottled Blonde in Scottsdale. And, yes, Mac received a gently used Dominoes Pizza Rolex watch. He had no clue it was coming and we’ll release the epic video later. 
But maybe you guys were right, Mac is a kinder, gentler person now. I thought he didn’t deserve his pizza watch but maybe I was wrong? Time will tell. Advertisement Advertisement 6 
You wanna’ know how awesome Jake Owen is? The meetup last night started at 7pm and Jake had a concert to play at 8:30 at a venue nowhere near our meetup. Jake called me at 6:30, “I’m going to theCHIVE meetup, I don’t care. Chivers have priority tonight. If I’m a little late, so be it.” 
That’s a true Chiver. Thanks, Jake. 
We are getting crazy at the Waste Management Open today, you’re going to want to follow my Instagram for what’s about to happen. 7
